workflow: Register as new user, login, open new savings account, and transfer funds

trace.thought: The goal is to register a new user. I am currently on the login page. I need to click the 'Register' link to navigate to the registration page. According to the knowledge bank, I should use the proven locator for the 'Register' link on the Login Page.

The goal is to register a new user, login, open a new savings account, and transfer funds. The history shows that I have already clicked the 'Register' link. Now I need to fill out the registration form. I will start with the first name field.

The goal is to register a new user, login, open a new savings account, and transfer funds. The history shows that I have already clicked the 'Register' link and filled in the registration form. Now I need to click the 'Register' button to submit the form and complete the registration process. According to the Learned Behavioral Rules, after clicking 'Register', I should wait for `text="Your account was created successfully"`.

The goal is to register a new user, log in, open a new savings account, and transfer funds. The history shows that I have already clicked the 'Register' link, filled the registration form, and clicked the 'Register' button. According to the Learned Behavioral Rules, after clicking 'Register', I should wait for `text="Your account was created successfully"`. Since I am already logged in after registration, I will proceed to open a new savings account.
